attributes.action: Require all cars to run on water instead of petrol or diesel.
attributes.background: We all know that burning fossil fuels damages the environment. Simply require all new cars to run on water instead of these scarce and environmentally damaging fuels.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. The Government and Parliament can't require all cars to run on water, as a vehicle that does so is not yet widely available. You could start a petition calling on the Government to fund research and development into water-powered cars.
